data.message: There is no reason to release anything on cassette in 2016. The only reason this is happening is because of hipster douchebags. No one under 30 even has a tape player anymore. Millennials barely even know what a cassette is.

replies.message: Alot of cars still have them installed. Playing music in the car is still popular.
I am 46 and I do not have a tape player anymore and neither do any of my cars. This is just a stupid stunt that will go down as one of the dumbest things ever.
I understand playing music in the car is still popular, Nick. I listen to music in mine all the time. Most people do. However, cassettes should not have come back. Ever.
